data: Margarita pizzas are 10$ for small, 15$ for medium and 20$ for big. The other predefined pizzas, except for carbonara are 2$ more for each size.
Sprite and Coke are 1.50$. Water is 1$.
It depends on the number of pizzas of the order, typically around 15 minutes per pizza, but depends on how busy we are.
Margarita pizzas are 10$ for small, 15$ for medium and 20$ for big. The other predefined pizzas, except for carbonara are 2$ more for each size.
